etri.sdn.controller.module.linkdiscovery

Class ILinkDiscoveryListener.LDUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • etri.sdn.controller.module.linkdiscovery.ILinkDiscoveryListener.LDUpdate
  • Enclosing interface:
    ILinkDiscoveryListener

    public static class ILinkDiscoveryListener.LDUpdate
extends java.lang.Object
    Actual update notification. the callback function ILinkDiscoveryListener.linkDiscoveryUpdate(LDUpdate) that IDiscoveryService object calls receives this object as parameter.
    Author:
    bjlee
